page.title: 04Primary School Chailey cont
page.content: the Christmas play and the Carol Service. The highlight of the school year is their week ay. In 1985 they stayed at the County Centre called Corsica Hall. Weeks activitis include visit to Seven Sisters Country Park, the field studies centre at Woods Mill, the Eastbourne Butterfly Centre. HOpe Gap for a beach study and a day in Hastings. Centre has 50 bedrooms and courses for adults took place at the same time.The adults all praised the chidren for good behaviour. Each day Mr Pratt gave a class lesson and they spent the day out looking at the environment.
